name: Chapter 14: The Ocean’s Edge
short_description: The group finally reaches the edge of the ocean. They are overwhelmed by the size and beauty of it. Each fish reflects on their journey and what they’ve learned.
events: Reaching the ocean, reflection on the journey, realization of growth.
from_prev_chapter: The group is close to reaching the ocean.

beats.long_title: Catching First Glimpse of the Ocean
beats.description: Bubbles and his friends finally catch a glimpse of the vast ocean. They feel overwhelmed by the sheer size and beauty it holds.
The group stands in silence, absorbing the beauty and magnificence of the ocean stretching infinitely before them.
The fish inch closer to the water’s edge, feeling the cool breeze and sensing the saltiness in the air. This new environment strikes a chord with each one of them.
As they move closer, each fish experiences flashbacks of the challenges, adventures, and lessons learned during their journey.

beats.long_title: Bubbles Reflects on His Personal Growth
beats.description: Bubbles takes a moment to reflect on his personal growth and transformation from when he first left the glass tank until now.
Finley looks back on his role in guiding the group, contemplating his own development as a leader and protector.

beats.long_title: Lola Realizes the Importance of Friendship
beats.description: Lola reflects on the friendships she has formed and how decisive and critical they have been to their survival and success.
Guppy remembers how timid and scared he was initially and acknowledges the immense courage he has discovered within himself.
The group shares their thoughts and feelings, developing an even deeper understanding of the value of unity and teamwork.

beats.long_title: Taking the First Steps into the Ocean
beats.description: With a mix of excitement and trepidation, the group prepares to take their first steps into the vast ocean, ready for the new adventures awaiting them.
